name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Hourly
description: This is a repository of hourly APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Weather Underground
apis.description: Weather Underground provides local & long range weather forecasts, weather reports, maps & tropical weather conditions for locations worldwide.

apis.name: Weatherbit.io
apis.description: Our Weather API is the most powerful Weather data API on the web. Sign up for our free Weather API, and upgrade as your weather data needs grow!

apis.name: ClimaCell
apis.description: ClimaCell provides the most accurate weather data in the world by integrating proprietary data extracted from wireless networks and other new sensing technologies with data from traditional sensors. With 90% correlation to ground truth (vs. 50% using radar), it’s the best you can get for your enterprise.
